description: A CSS file defining variables for theme management and styles for the Room Mapper application, including styling for elements such as the app header, buttons, and responsive design rules.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling with center alignment and theme-based colors.

classes.name: room-canvas-wrapper
classes.description: Wrapper for the room canvas with specific layout and user interaction settings.

classes.name: room-rect
classes.description: Styles for rectangle elements representing rooms, including focus and selected states.

classes.name: room-toolbar
classes.description: Styling for the toolbar containing controls for the room layout.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styles for toggling between light and dark themes.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles for the application, including layout and background color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styles within the app, utilizing theme variables for colors.
